website_summaries.verdict: Bright, clear display and flexible features give the best possible rear view.
pros: Provides 170° wide viewing angle and good night vision
The 1080P HD images offer greater clarity than competitors, and flicker-free images
cons: Very few owners report faults – with no single issue

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Camera was great at first. Great picture quality, easy to install. However after 30 days started to flicker on and off. Than would capture previous back up and store in memory. Eventually started to lag and now sometimes comes on sometimes doesn't. Not happy with purchase recommended more expensive camera or possible going for wired connection. Went with wires connection because of easy install should have know better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of pain to install but works great once installed. The wiring for the camera has some larger "lumps" that required 3/8" hole to get thru. That was larger than was available in several spots. I had to get creative to get the camera wired to the back-up lights thru the 4Runner lift gate. Once it was wired, the camera and display worked well. It has been installed less than a week so no idea about reliability yet.
customer_reviews.author: CxAgent

customer_reviews.title: Easy - peasy
customer_reviews.text: I could have sworn that I posted a video review but I guess for some reason it didn't get through. This is a real good deal for the money. Easy to install without having to route wires all over the place. The quality is great for the money, nice heavy solid steel for the license frame, e.g. The image is clear and bright, instructions are good, even if in Chinglish! :) All in all a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Fatalflaw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on a 2015 Ford 250 SD Diesel. It was easy to install. So far it works however I have not tried it at night. I just plan on using it for trailer hookups anyway. I will caution, I had issues with the tire pessure monitoring system while driving and leaving the backup monitor itself on, I have to be sure to turn off the monitor when not using it. (the camera only comes on with the backup lights) The Tire Pressue monitor kept throwing 'sensor' errors while it was on. Minor issue for me as its for a single use item. Cant rate longevity yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and clear picture!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing color and clarity on the monitor. It was so simple to install and adjust the camera. Beautiful view in color of rear of the vehicle. No more backing out of a parking spot blind or having to try more than once to hook my trailer. This looks and work better than a friend’s camera in his new truck! Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Wireless Backup Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my mom's Honda Odyssey and it works wonderful. It was very easy to install and the video quality is amazing. The signal is very strong between the camera and screen and I haven't seen any problems with it being wireless. Also I really like how they have a magnetic mount option as well; however, the magnet on the back of the screen came off after the first time I removed it from the magnet mount but some super glue should have no problem fixing that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: quality and performance
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the camera, I was disappointed, it was slow in response. I contacted the technician and he sent me a replacement camera and it works great . The part I want to add is the technician kept communications open for several days checking if I had received the camera and how well it was working. He never gave up until I was satisfied. You don't get that type of dedication very much. I want to give "kudos" to that person and to the product. Thanks for your effort going beyond the call of duty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could ask for for money.
customer_reviews.text: Had "Geek Squad" install it. They said it was very easy to install and works better than other higher priced ones. 5 in. screen is clear, easy to see, comes on quick, is very light weight and mounted and holds tight to my air vent. Adjustments are very easy. I especially like the red lit on/off button on the cigarette lighter adapter. The camera mount is solid and held on with license plate bolts. High 69 rating for weather and advertised to work to -20 degrees. Did lots of research and am happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Arvid J. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is excellent. The product itself is good. It arrived with the antenna not working correctly because it basically just fell off, but the company quickly shipped me 2 replacement antenna and it resolved the problem. I had to glue the metal magnetic receiver back on to the monitor as it just fell off as well, but all in all it is a decent little camera and it saved me time because now I didn't need to run wires through the firewall of my truck
customer_reviews.author: Daylon Wilton

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Kit included instructions with a nice "legend" with pictures for all of the parts - so you'll know what part goes where. They took the time to include optional cords according to your comfort with electrical work - they include cords if you want to use the cigarette lighter, but also an extra cord if you prefer to hard wire into electrical near the radio, etc. Thought what was nice so you have options. Even included cable ties to secure wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Invisible Trailer
customer_reviews.text: Installed on our 26 foot camper. It's just like having an invisible trailer. You can see directly behind the trailer way better than camper mirrors allow. Perfect for backing up with the trailer behind also. Guides you perfectly into tight camping spots also. Value is far better than the price suggests.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my Polaris side by side. The camera was east to install, provides great picture. Love it is waterproof. The wireless works great, the monitor has great color and is very clear. Like the mounting options. Would recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! Camera system
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal products. I continue to purchase this company's products because its exactly what meets my needs and wallet. This company must sell to the other big box stores. The prices and quality is by far superior at this price. This wireless camera set is a no brainer for my rear hatch.
customer_reviews.author: 007 BOND

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great camera quality and easy to install. I love the fact that is wireless. I have tried other wireless cameras in the past and none of them worked as good as this one
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product and began the set per the video instructions, the fuse in the accessory plug blew out and melted the mother board. I contacted the seller via email and they responded within 24 hrs. After I explained and showed them a photo of the issue, they sent a new plug which arrived before the week was out. Communication was awesome, once I received the new part the installation was under 1 hour. Works great, even the wife likes it. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: mark mikula

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know what I was missing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Product! Purchased this mainly to align My trailer hitch ( don't need My wife anymore to tell Me a little more left when it's really a little more right). However, I didn't know it was so much more. Backing in parking spaces, backing out in shopping Mall lots (You never see people coming) My insurance company should give Me a discount now!! Don't know about other models, but this one does everything it says. Quality materials, excellent picture, and easy to install. About 30 min (most difficult thing was looking up wire color to My reverse lights on My truck.
customer_reviews.author: Ron in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for day and night vision.
customer_reviews.text: Installed 2 cameras, one in our 2014 Suburban and one in our 2013 Volkswagen Beetle. They both work really well with very clear vision both during the day and at night. They also work well in a rain storm. Installation was easy after watching the recommended video. Enough wiring was supplied with the units that we were able to mount the Suburban camera directly to the front windshield and hide the wiring to an available fused area. I would recommend this product for anyone looking for a quality backup cam area wit night vision at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials, low price!!
customer_reviews.text: Camera came packaged really well! It did take me a bit to install. Instructions were really clear, however, I was trying to not have to cut into existing wiring. Thanks to the shipper, there are plenty of video's on how to do this. The camera quality is excellent! The license plate camera frame is really heavy and seems like it will handle the elements here in NC. For the price and quality that I see, you will be happy with the purchase. This is a great camera/video combination if your current vehicle does not have built in.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Watch several installation video
customer_reviews.text: decide if you want to hook into back up lights or have power on all the time. Wires that come with the camera are very small and one needs to be very careful how you hook these into existing wiring. When it is done right the picture is great and you have control from the monitor. Good setup.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install. Great picture.
customer_reviews.text: Even though the Printed instructions were vague the video was helpful. Excellent picture, easy to install. I had a question on the guide lines and sent an email to the store for help. Received a very quick and very helpful answer from customer service. Certainly would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Bill d

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I like the picture quality.I had to modify the mount ,but it wasn't hard.I would reccommend this product to others.Works great to back up to boat trailer or other items!I used the power outlet plug to power my unit,so I didnt have to route any wiring & it is still well out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: charles s.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a Kia Optima 2015. No difficulties and quality is good. On this Optima, there’s a plastic cover to the right of the rear trunk release (it’s for those models that have a camera) that can be used to route the camera wire into the trunk to connect to the reverse light. I drilled a 3/8” hole in the plastic cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way to see behind my cargo trailer when backing up as well as while driving down the highway. Although this product is designed to be licence plate mounted, I easily mounted the camera high/center on the trailer (see photos). This camera mount provides me with a fantastic view of everything behind the trailer. The picture quality on the monitor is superb. The system is delivered with optional power hook-ups and a terrific windshield mount. Made the installation very simple. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Goulette

customer_reviews.title: Good video quality
customer_reviews.text: Camera was easy to install, good video quality. Only problems were no instructions on how to disable the guidelines (web page states ability to turn them on or of) Called tech support and they couldn't help...no solution. Sent a message to mfg. their solution didn't work. Also the camera is mounted straight and true but the picture on the screen is crooked and guide lines are very skewed toward the corner. (that's why I need to disable them).
customer_reviews.author: Jack K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera and Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: Camera and Monitor arrived in a well-packaged box with everything you needed for an easy installation. I had the whole thing operational in less than an hour. Hardest thing you'll need to do is tapping into your backup lights for power. The monitor requires only plugging into your cigarette lighter. Love the clarity of 1080p picture. I did encounter one problem when I dropped a part inside the car and couldn't find it. I contacted LeeKooLuu's customer service and they sent me a replacement within days. Greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Panas

customer_reviews.title: It Worked
customer_reviews.text: This kit is very complete. All items are included for install. Installation is very fast and easy . I liked it so much I have a second kit and intend to order another. This seller is excellent to work with. They produce when you expect. Seymore
customer_reviews.author: seymore

customer_reviews.title: Great backup camera and seller!
customer_reviews.text: This leekooluu license plate backup camera and monitor are very good quality. The plate frame is made of heavy metal not plastic. The camera is rated ip69 waterproof. This is a nice kit for the money. And the seller is first class and very attentive!
customer_reviews.author: Bonanza Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great license plate camera, monitor antennae looks hoaky, like old CB radio
customer_reviews.text: Works good. The license plate frame and camera seem outstanding. Monitor works ok, but that antenna looks, well, ugh. Very poor instructions. Gridlines- if that option is selected- stay on all the time even when camera is off.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Back Up Camera is nice addition to 2002 F150
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the antennae for the license plate was built into the cable. Nice strong signal to the monitor. Monitor has great view and very clear. Well built license plate that includes the camera.
customer_reviews.author: lman65

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but installation is painful
customer_reviews.text: An excellent wireless camera - picture quality is great in day and night. Installation is bit tricky. I have an older accord 2005 which did not had a hole in the licence plate so had to drill, which is made installation quite painful.
customer_reviews.author: Y.

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice back up camera. I’m impressed with the picture on the screen and the night vision led’s illuminate a good size area when going in reverse at night. A great overall value. Real easy to setup and install too.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Works Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, I just installed it and tested it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Gordon

customer_reviews.title: great clarity!
customer_reviews.text: this works much better than my old one which was analog video. that had lots of static and unstable picture. this one is crystal clear day and night. i like the guideline options, and the ability to remove the monitor from the dash when I want. install was not bad, hard to connect it to my tail light, but not any fault of unit - just my taillight wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory R. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best and easiest installing for a backup camera. It as a simple setup , placing camera over the plate and connecting to the reverse wiring was as hard as it got but that was easy as well and for the monitor is was just connecting it to The cigarette commectiom on the vehicle . I highly recommend this set up . The seller as very helpful with questions I had
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Very good wireless camera !
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality of the picture, on and off button for the guided lines, colour monitor good, does not have the night vision lights, but If there are some lights around you can see. Excellent customer services if you have any problem or you need information. Very easy to install ! For the price it is a very good wireless camera.
customer_reviews.author: Michel St-Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Work fine when it was first installed. Second time I need it to work it didn’t work well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Johns

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Installed and works like a charm!!! Easiest clearest backup camera I have had. Installed on a 2002 Chevy Silverado and install took 20 mins from test to install to driving and using. Cant say enough about it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy W.

customer_reviews.title: A great camera system for my car
customer_reviews.text: The package was shipped quickly. I installed this myself on my BMW X3 easily. I drilled a hole behind the license plate to let the camera cable go through it. The cable was connected to the back light wire. The camera itself was easy to setting up in the front too. The whole system works great and reliable. I really love this camera. It gives me great help with backing up and confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great backup system
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy system to install on me 1999 SL500 Because the battery is in the trunk. It now gives me great visibility in backing into our crowded garage! I like the image and the guidelines make it easy. The people are great to work with....very responsive when you need them. Glad I bought It from them!
customer_reviews.author: James Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Only took a matter of minutes and it was ready to use and works great
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my pick up truck. I like the magnet on the back of the unit you don't have to pull the mount off to hide it away. Has good reception. Has adjustments for brightness and contrast.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Connection issues - it would only connect about 25% of the time. Screen would just stay black. Contacted manufacturer and once they finally responded they said it was a power issue on my truck (was not the Case). Returned it and bought a cheaper one that was wired and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: ADJ

customer_reviews.title: A FANTASTIC CAMERA SYSTEM
customer_reviews.text: This is a very top quality camera system. This video is superb and the range is fantastic, close to 100ft outdoors. I bench tested it indoors at the 35ft before taken it outdoors. The video is brilliant in the vehicle. I installed it on the front of a Buick lesabre. It will be a great compliment to my existing cable back up camera.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarman

customer_reviews.title: Very good high quality backup camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend to put in her 2008 Chevy Silverado and Loved it! It has a very nice wide angle lens and many different mounting options. It was well worth the money and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good service
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It is a good quality product! It is easy to install and packing is good! It has installed on my 2002 Lexus Rx300. Now , it is very clear and sure there is nothing behind when I back up my car! Also customer services is good too, when I need help!
customer_reviews.author: rong zheng

customer_reviews.title: Best upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Bought This product as an upgrade from the standard 720P Wireless back up camera. Best upgrade 5 inch screen and 1080 P display huge noticeable difference me and my wife are please It was a great purchas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Unstall
customer_reviews.text: So I received this product in ample time to put it on Camper van. It was very easy to install had all the information on how to use it. The wireless camera is a great part of the system. Very clear picture of the surroundings behind the vehicle. This is the second back up camera system I have purchased from LeeKooLuu. I could not be happier with my system.
customer_reviews.author: Dj deal

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Put it on a 2012 Silverado. Wired the camera over the plate to a hot wire. The screen is to the provided cigarette lighter switch. Picture quality could be better. But priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Directions were written in terrible English and the videos were even worse. Despite this, I was able to install the camera fairly easily once I figured out the wiring into the back up lights. System works fine. Camera quality is pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews about how good the picture is and how easy it is to install. I am pleased to say all of those reviews were correct. The picture is amazing. It is very crisp and clear. I could not believe how easy this backup camera was to install. I did quite a lot of research prior to making the final decision and am very happy with my purchase. I will be recommending this backup camera to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, clear picture with good resolution. Only a very slight connection delay after dropping into reverse - hardly even noticeable. Have used for 2+ weeks now, very pleased. Seems like made of quality materials, robust. Good screen mounting options included. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent resolution and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in a 2013 Mitsubishi Outlander Sport and it works fantastic. I was able to install it without having to drill any holes or make any type of modifications.
customer_reviews.author: LANA LAVERY

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have installed it on a small travel trailer. Had to modify the mounting bracket to fit in a central location as the license plate was offset. Works well though would like to have a more robust antenna on the display unit. I do have the camera setup so I can check what is behind while driving and experience occasional dropout of video. If used just for backing up this isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, very good image and so easy to install .Great value and also great customer service .
customer_reviews.author: uney3

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good option to easily install a backup camera in a car. While it does not match the the quality of a factory installed OEM system it is a great solution to upgrade a vehicle that does not have this option. Camera power ties in to the reverse backup lights.
customer_reviews.author: BStates

customer_reviews.title: Very Clear color picture- I use it to watch trailer towing
customer_reviews.text: I hooked this up to the license plate lighting so I can use it anytime I want to watch boat/motorcycle/utility trailer. Very good quality. Very very responsive seller! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Old car feels like new with rear view camera.
customer_reviews.text: Had the camera for a couple of weeks and am amazed at high definition color. Geek Squad installed camera and they were impressed by strong wireless signal. Better than many. Now I feel safer when reversing my 16 year old car.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera with simple installation!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome! If you have ever done any sort of wiring or DIY you won't have any trouble running this through the inside of your car panels and connecting with the right wiring. The picture quality is great and overall it is an awesome deal. Definitely would recommend to anyone looking to add a backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Jackman

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described and was very simple to install. This was on a 2008 F-150. Would recommend to anyone looking to improve their rear view safety and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Deven Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: When the box arrived the antenna, for the monitor, was missing. Emailed customer support, answered a couple questions and two days later I had the antenna. Installed on our plow truck, Very easy to install, works better then expected! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: TRoback

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wireless Rear View Backup Camera
customer_reviews.text: This product is durable, very good quality, and has a very good image even at night. It is relatively easy to install and works well. Sandra Sarasota, Florida
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1080p  backup cam
customer_reviews.text: Camera arrived in short time. Worked on car for 10 min and then lost pairing. Would not pair again so contacted cust support. They sent me a new unit and arrived in 1 day. Current unit is a newer version (supports 2 camera). Current cam unit has been burning in on bench for 4 hours. So far works well will install on vehicle next
customer_reviews.author: Truck

customer_reviews.title: Added safety and ease of installation
customer_reviews.text: Installed this product in less than an hour. Well packaged and with solid construction. Would recommend for friends and family. Happy to have this added safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate discription
customer_reviews.text: Item description is inccurate. Stated that it will operate with a minimum of 9 volts. Camera requires minimum 12 volts to operate. Don't buy until you check the voltage of your power source for this camera. Returned. Too bad, seemed like a nice item.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar H. Lambert II

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It’s better than my other camera, crisp image and awesome resolution!!
customer_reviews.author: Hello2020

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Works great. Perfect picture on screen. Terrific purchase. Great customer service. They respond quickly. Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: David Rosenker

customer_reviews.title: Good product . Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Way more than I expected. Night vision is great. Overall picture quality is very good. Very easy to install when you read all the way thru the instructions. May 10-15 minutes to install. I recommend this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Free bird

customer_reviews.title: Its not a good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: It works for 10 sec..and fail.do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Easy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. So easy to install and ya. Picture quality is very good. Using this on a travel trailer to help with back up.
customer_reviews.author: Christie E. Evers

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works well as advertised. Easy install and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to install once we found the correct wires to connect to. Camera has good visibility and display is easy to view on dash. Overall am happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M White

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Product was packaged nicely, fairly easy to install, great picture during the day and night. Very happy with purchase and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B

customer_reviews.title: This works great
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install, we tied it in to our back up lights. So, it is on every time we put the car in reverse. It has a great picture and works as we intended
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Gallatin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this on the back of a travel trailer,perfect just what I needed This is the best thing
customer_reviews.author: kevin grant

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera unit 👍
customer_reviews.text: Very solid product. Easy to install and really bright screen. Less wiring since camera connects to screen via Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Dahanayaka

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. Everything as described. Works great but make sure that you have a good connection to the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Al  S.

customer_reviews.title: Backup camera
customer_reviews.text: Due to a disability, I was leasing a car and got used to a back up camera. When I was able to adjust and get used to my pathfinder I missed having the camera. So easy to install, I am so happy now
customer_reviews.author: Irene Ortiz Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It works great, makes it a lot easier for me to hook up my trailer by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Installation instructions could be a little more complete however it’s pretty basic. All in all it’s about what I expected and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Old Ford truck lover.

customer_reviews.title: Very good experience, very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Received the back up camera kit quickly. Was easy to install. Works great! Company is very accommodating to deal with. Looking forward to receiving the 2nd unit.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to install. Works great. Good picture on the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M. Larson

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I tried wiring 3 different times fallowed the instructions to the T I couldn’t get a signal do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Domenic Defazio

customer_reviews.title: Did not work!
customer_reviews.text: The cigarette lighter power source did not work. Tried in 3 different cars and it never would power up--no red light. Installation video leaves a lot to the imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Dworaczyk

customer_reviews.title: Great product especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my F150 easily, Had 1 issue during the install and got quick support. Works great. Glad I bought it and feel like it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It really doesn’t work in my 32 ‘ class rv
customer_reviews.author: ronald culbertson

customer_reviews.title: Can't be beat for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear, sharp picture. Easy to install and terrific to have an adapter in the kit to re-test before installing. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: James Foley

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality and easy to install. No problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: yahooguy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera,super easy installation.I never had an easier way to hook up my boat.Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: MACK HAGEWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Leekooluu L09 Excellent
customer_reviews.text: In our VW Beatle Convertible the Leekooluu L09 wireless backup camera/display has a much better definition than our OEM backup cam on our other car. I higly recommend the L09.

customer_reviews.text: Great wireless back up camera. Easy to install. Works great.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value, works well, lifetime warranty. What's not to love?!?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase from the same company and I like it better than the first one. The monitor is larger and the picture quality on both are amazing. What I did, because I already had installed the first that was wireless, I installed just the monitor and used the existing camera and it worked perfectly. Then, I thought what the hell, I installed the camera that came with it and the picture quality was way better. Guess what? This is my full time back up camera. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Soluna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit after putting a ding in my Tundra fender backing up to a hitch ball. It is now a simple process to hook up to my boat. I installed the unit to the drivers side taillight on a 2007 Toyota Tundra (google search for correct wire color for 12v and ground for your model truck) and mounted the monitor to the windshield. After installation I had a very clear picture day and night, and nice size monitor. I couldn’t be happier with the product. Great performance and price!
customer_reviews.author: Woody Barlow

product_meta.title: LeeKooLuu 1080P Wireless Backup Camera 5’’ Display Digital Signals 2020 New Chips for Trucks,Small RVs,Camper,Car IP69 Waterproof Driving Hitch Rear/Front View Observation Super Night Vision-F09
feature_bullets: Parking Safely & Effortlessly – With LeeKooLuu Wireless Backup Camera Kit,you will be able to easily park your car even in the tiniest parking spots.Without risking damaging it and ruining your day or night .
IP69K Waterproof Digital Wireless License Plate Camera – 150°viewing angle and Easy to hook up to combat bad weather. It's also fog resistant with a super night vision ability.

Multifunction 5 Inch HD 1080P Display – The menu key on the back of the Display can adjust brightness, chroma,contrast and turn the guild lines ON/OFF and the Mirror/Facing Image Flip. Witched mirrored/facing view makes the backup cameras can used for front facing camera.Monitor can be fixed on the dashboard or mounted on the windshield.
The system is compatible with Trucks,Cars,Campers,Vans,Mini RVs etc, No flickers and Interference Under 40ft Vehicle for Reversing use. A professional instruction sheet comes in the package.
Reliable service&warranty: If you have any product questions,please contact us. 24-hours customer service and 2 years warranty is available via service@rearcamera.store
